description.@en: There’s a power inside of me that I don’t yet understand, but it’s urging me to pick up iron to fight against the shadow . . .

data.notes:
Mage Trait

Professions of this Archetype make use of strange healing arts, plumb the depths of the supernatural and study Spells. They come from all walks of life and have sacrificed some part of their humanity to further their aims.

effect.@en: Any weapon you hold is treated as magically enhanced for purposes of striking threats that can only be affected by Spells or weapons imbued with it.
